about_the_game:
Experience the most exciting and immersive beat-em-up combat system ever – become a kickass ninja and slice some demons in style! Join a band of wisecracking warriors in a bloody adventure through the land of mythical monsters and mysterious machines.

FEATURES

  • Play solo or with friends: 4 player local and online co-op
  • Experience immersive and intuitive controls: right analog stick controls your weapon giving you instant access to extensive moveset
  • Enjoy gameplay that never gets old: master the multilayered combat, overcome clever enemies and face epic bosses
  • Experiment with freestyle combat system: mix and match combos, switch characters on the fly and turn enemy abilities against them

Witness the glory of beat-em-up 2.0!

content_descriptors.notes: Shing! contains Violence, Blood and Strong Language.

detailed_description:
Experience the most exciting and immersive beat-em-up combat system ever – become a kickass ninja and slice some demons in style! Join a band of wisecracking warriors in a bloody adventure through the land of mythical monsters and mysterious machines.

FEATURES

  • Play solo or with friends: 4 player local and online co-op
  • Experience immersive and intuitive controls: right analog stick controls your weapon giving you instant access to extensive moveset
  • Enjoy gameplay that never gets old: master the multilayered combat, overcome clever enemies and face epic bosses
  • Experiment with freestyle combat system: mix and match combos, switch characters on the fly and turn enemy abilities against them

Witness the glory of beat-em-up 2.0!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: Intel i3 2100+ or AMD FX-4100+
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM, OpenGL 3.2+ compatible, nVidia GT 720+ or AMD HD 5450+ or Intel HD Graphics 5000
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14
  • Processor: Intel i5 2400+ or AMD Phenom II X4 850+
  • Graphics: 1024 MB VRAM, OpenGL 3.2+ compatible, nVidia GTX 750+ or AMD Radeon HD 7770M+ or Intel HD Graphics 5300+
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+ Mountain Lion
  • Processor: Intel i3 2100+ or AMD FX-4100+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM, OpenGL 3.2+ compatible, nVidia GT 720+ or AMD HD 5450+ or Intel HD Graphics 5000+
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+ Mountain Lion
  • Processor: Intel i5 2400+ or AMD Phenom II X4 850+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB VRAM, OpenGL 3.2+ compatible, nVidia GTX 750+ or AMD Radeon HD 7770M+ or Intel HD Graphics 5300+
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

name: Shing! Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 2100+ or AMD FX-4100+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM, nVidia GT 720+ or AMD HD 5450+ or Intel HD Graphics 5000+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 2100+ or AMD FX-4100+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM, nVidia GT 720+ or AMD HD 5450+ or Intel HD Graphics 5000+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Experience the most exciting and immersive beat-em-up combat system ever – become a kickass ninja and slice some demons in style!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
